Class FakeGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • other.FakeGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class FakeGUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIConnector
    Fake gui only used for testing

      • setToBank

        public void setToBank(int ordBank,
                      Bank bank)
        Description copied from interface: GUIConnector
        sets a domino to the players bank at index. Empties it if domino is null.
        Specified by:
        setToBank in interface GUIConnector
        Parameters:
        ordBank - ordinal value of the bank that will be updated (0 for current, 1 for next bank)
        bank - reference to the bank that will be displayed / updated on the gui

      • showInChooseBox

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        dominoRotated - current domino of the human player

        public void blurOtherFields(PossibleField saturatedField)
        Description copied from interface: GUIConnector

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
